name: Pumpkin Pie Panic
description:
It's almost time for the autumn festival, but all your pumpkins came alive, uh oh.

Welp, now you gotta survive 5 days and collect enough chunks of em' to make that delicious pumpkin pie!

Includes:

  • A little over 15 - 20 minutes of gameplay!
  • 3 different enemies.
  • 4 different weapons.
  • One pumpkin farmer.
  • One shopkeeper.
  • Pumpkin Pie! (If you're vigilant.)

Tip! Try your best to end each day with full health, you may just get a nice reward!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Attack

Q & E - Switch Weapons

ESC for pause menu

This game was made in (roughly) 20 days for the Great Autumn Jam 2021!

(Small bugfix, pressing esc on the title screen in the web version crashed the game, fixed now!)
